text:
Hi there, I’m a Content Marketing Strategist and Content & Brand Competence Lead at <http://www.advanceb2b.com|www.advanceb2b.com>, a growth marketing agency based in Helsinki.

We focus on providing growth marketing services for B2B SaaS companies and work with companies like Drift, Supermetrics, Wibbitz, and Salesforce.

I’m here because we just developed a new competence lead role so I’m looking to learn how other agencies define different competencies (Content Specialists vs Strategists) and how you develop career paths at agencies (where to go after Strategist).

Additionally, we sometimes hire freelance writers/content marketers who have experience w/ B2B SaaS companies.
